title: While He Was Sleeping
description: When a luxury car dealer is found dead, detectives suspect one of his lovers, but lack of evidence stalls the case for a year until one clue breaks it wide open. Josh Mankiewicz has chosen this episode as one of his most memorable classic episodes.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
